titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: 1813, Jan. 1. F. Write to A Robinson & M . Persiles, p. 260.

2. Sa. Persiles, p. 310. Call on Bedder
,
Curtis
,
Brooks
&
Place
: Hogan & R M sup. Watchman dies.

Jan. 3. Su. May, p. 84: Persiles, p. 326. Adams calls: dine at J Stewart’s , w. J Taylor, K Courtney, Turner, Wilmot, J Foot & Hume & 2; adv. mes Taylor & son
.

4. M. Write to Patrickson . Flather & J J Morgan call: A Curran & T Ht dine; adv. V Ht
.

5. Tu. Write to Faulder . Persiles, p. 372. Tilson’s Clk , Flather & Parkman call: call on Longdil
&
Rodd
.

6. W. Write to Miller, A S . Persiles, p. 399. Morgan & Brookes jr
na call: call on Place
&
Brookes . na
7. Th. Write to C C (self-love). May, p. 115, fin. Place calls.

8. F. Dictionary. Dine at
D Stuart’s , w. Owen (Lanark), Coleridge, Morgan & Alston painter.
9. Sa. Dictionary. Collier, p. 52.

Jan. 10. Su. Dictionary. Collier, p. 98: Lloyd, çala. Kennies, A Curran, H Robinson dine; invités Fuseli, Northcote, Wolcot, J Taylor, Knowles & Hamond ; adv. Newtons
.
11. M. Meet Hill : H Robinson at tea (bond, W M ): Dawe calls.
12. Tu. Montaigne, pp. 30. Toppings 3 & W Gordon dine.
13. W. Montaigne, pp. 29. Poole & Parkman call: Hogan sups. Red Cross, Rushworth .

14. Th. Dictionary. Lecture, Abernethy, w. Parkman
: Liston calls: M dines.
15. F. Dictionary. Salmacis, F Bt, p. 14.
16. Sa. Dictionary. Salmacis, p. 28, fin: Hacket, p. 6.
Jan. 17. Su. Remedy of Love, F Bt : Hacket, p. 46. A Curran at tea.
18. M. Write to Knowles & Jo G . Hacket, p. 58. Newton & M na call: meet OBrien .
19. Tu. Dictionary. Hacket, p. 72. Rough & Macmillan call: theatre, Love, Law & Physic.

20. W.
Owen of Lanark calls: call on Curtis
&
Rodd
.

21. Th.
Owen breakfasts: call on Place
: Hogan at tea. Aleyn, p. 112.

22. F. Call on Wilkie
&
Robinson
,
J White
&
Hume
: meet Imray : Owen & Hogan sup.

23. Sa. Call on Ward
: A Curran dines:
theatre, w. M J, F, M, J, W, & Curran & Hogan—Remorse; adv. Hamonds, H Robinson, Lambs & M Burney
.

Jan. 24. Su.
Owen breakfasts. Write to Owen . Hacket, p. 101. / property, freewill & population. C M in town.
25. M. Write to Shelley . Hacket, p. 104. Merivale calls: Hogan at tea: theatre, Students of Salamanca.
26. Tu. Zeno, çala. Lambs sup.
27. W. Dictionary, çala. Hacket, p. 108.

28. Th. Dictionary. Hacket, p. 122. Owen & Melis na call: call on Place
&
Hume
.

29. F. Dictionary. Hacket, p. 134. Hogan at tea. Call on
Orme .&
30. Sa. Aleyne, p. 32: Angler, p. 16: Rehearal Trd, Pt II, p. 36: Hacket, p. 142. Call on Lambert .
Jan. 31. Su. Dictionary. Aleyn, p. 50: Angler, p. 41.

Feb. 1. M. Hacket, p. 164. Owen & M call: call on
Hill
n .
2. Tu. Hacket, p. 202. W Hopwood & mrs Oldfield call.

3. W. Dictionary. Write to Patrickson . Virgil, Aen. vs Hacket, p. 228; Pt II, p. 27. Call on
Hume
: Owen & Hamond n call.
4. Th. Angler, p. 75: Marvel, p. 90: Hacket, p. 44. M calls: Lambs sup.

5. F. Dictionary. Gul’s Horn-Book, p. 130. Call on Letterman
: A Curran sups.

6. Sa. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. M Antoninus, pp. 366 : Dekker, p. 178, fin.

Feb. 7. Sa.
Cleveland, çala. Call on Place , w. Owen ; adv. Thomas : Owen & Walsh dine: H Robinson sups.

8. M. Dictionary. Call on Rough
n : Lambs & A Curran sup. Write to Patrickson .

9. Tu. Write to Hamond & Taylor, Norwich
. Stephns
, Parkman & Lambert call: call on Rodd
&
Lackington
.

10. W. Satyr on Hypocrites, pp. 24. Call on
Constable {;} adv. Patrick : Constable, Patrick, Owen & Place sup; adv. A Curran
.
11. Th. Write to Shelley . Newton calls.

12. F. Call on Ward
&
Hume
& Rodd . A Curran sups. Call on Denley
.
13. Sa. Mustapha, act 1. Owen at tea.
Feb. 14. Su. Mustapha, act 2. Dine at Kenny’s , w. M J & C Baxter .

15. M.
Usurer . Guildhall, Grand Jury: trial, rescue, Leekey, v. Edwards : Hamond calls: A Curran eveng .
16. Tu. Philipses, p. 3. Mustapha, act 3. Call on Murray, for John Perry : Hogan at tea: Jas Smith & A Taylor call. meet J Stewart .

17. W. Philipses, p. 6. Mustapha, act 4. Call on Waldron
.

18. Th. Philipses, p. 8/2. Newtonn
& Owen n call, & Place .

19. F. Philipses, p. 9. Jas White calls: call on Constable
; adv. Imray, &c.
20. Sa. Philipses, p. 11. Hacket, p. 66.
Feb. 21. Su. Philipses, p. 14. Hacket, p. 90.

22. M. Philipses, p. 16. Letter to Christ’s Hospital
. Hacket, p. 98. Write to A Robinson .

23. Tu. Philipses, p. 18. Hacket, p. 122. Call on Place
&
Hume
.

24. W. Write to Longdil . Hutchinson, çala.
Theatre, w. M J, F, M, & C Br , Love for //Love, & Nell .

25. Th. Royalists, çala. Call on R Sharp (adv. Boddington ) &
Salle
: theatre, At Home; adv. Surr
: Owen sups.

26. F. Write to Shelley , & Whittel, Hertford
. Royalists, çala: Hacket, p. 128. Gutch & Hogan call: call on
Hume
. Write to Jas White .

27. Sa. Philipses, p. 20. Hacket, p. 140. Call on Longdil
: write to Shelley : Newtons at tea; adv. Hogan
.

Feb. 28. Su. Philipses, p. 23. Hacket, p. 182. Call on Place ; adv. Owen
.
Mar. 1. M. Philipses, p. 25. Owen calls: send to W Allen : write to Macmillan : call on Ward & Newcombe, Praed’s .

2. Tu. Write to Shelley . Hacket, p. 203. Call on
Davison
,
mrs Delaitre
&
S E
: Owen & M Lamb call: call on Gold
: meet Phillips : theatre, At Home.
3. W. Philipses, p. 27. Hacket, p. 224. M & Owen call: S E dines: Hogan sups. Planta calls.n

4. Th. Philipses, p. 29. Hacket, p. 230, fin. M dines: call on
Hogan
n : Hogan calls.
5. F. Philipses, p. 30/2. Letter from H Shelley : write to her & Curran. Call on Place , w.M J : Owen breakfasts: tea Newton’s , w. Northcote, Owen, W & C Lawrence, Humes, 4, M J, F, M & C Baxter .

6. Sa. Write to Constable & R T . Call on Waithman
: Hogan sups.
Mar. 7. Su. Saunderson, çala.

8. M. Write to Davison , Lambert , A Curran & Kenny . Love & Eloquence, çala. A Curran calls: call on Hume
.

9. Tu. Philipses, p. 31. B Montagu & E Topping call: call on Londil
nit & Harrison, Bermondsey
: H Robinson sups.
10. W. Philipses, p. 35. Jo G calls: Owen dines.

11. Th. Philipses, p. 36. M Lamb calls: S E dines; adv. M
.

12. F. Philipses, p. 38/2. Call on Knowles
&
Hume
: Lbs at tea; adv. H Robinson & Hogan
. Lambert calls.

13. Sa. Philipses, p. 39. Harrison calls: call on
Knowles
. Write to West .

Mar. 14. Su. Philipses, p. 42/2. Dine at Hume’s , w. Listons, Lambs, Hazlits, M Burney, B Mercier & mrs Thomson, M J, M & C Br , adv. Lewis, mrs Burke, & miss Davis, & mrs Hutchinson
: call on Mulready
.

15. M. Philipses, p. 46/2. Call on Jo G
&
White
.
16. Tu. Trial of Vane. Red Cross Library; State Trials, & Parl. History .

17. W. Philipses, p. 49. Call on Starkey
: Hamond & Robley call.
18. Th. Baxter’s Life, çala. Place calls: call on Ingram, cabinet-maker , w. M J .
19. F. Philipses, p. 54/2. A Harwood at tea: Hogan sups.

20. Sa. Philipses, pp. 2 1/2. Owen at tea: call on
Rodd
.

Mar. 21. Su. Philipses, 1 1/2 pp. Call on Kenny , w. M J, F, M & C Br
.

22. M. Philipses, 2 pp, & p. 54. Call on Rodd
.

23. Tu. Philipses, p. 55, & 1/2 p. Red Cross Library; Athenae Oxon : call on Hume
: meet Hill .

24. W. Philipses, p. 58/2. Call on Rodd
, Athenae Oxonienses, 1721.

25. Th. Philipses, p. 60/2. Call on Davison
n &
Morgan
: M dines; adv. Owen .

26. F. Philipses, p. 60. M calls from Morgan
: Lackington’s : Hogan sups.

27. Sa. Philipses, p. 62. Phipps calls: call on Rodd
.

Mar. 28. Su. Philipses, p. 63. Call on Place
: Owen, A Newton & D Lamb dine; invité Walsh
.

29. M. Maronides, çala. Call on Stoddart
&
Rodd
: Phipps calls.

30. Tu. Philipses, p. 67. Write to Shelley . S E na & Chamberlaine call: call on M Lamb
.
31. W. Phillipses, p. 68/2. Museum; Montelion , Lawes & Hawkins : H Robinson sups.

Apr. 1. Th. Philipses, p. 73. Call on Bindley
&
Rodd
.

2. F. Philipses, p. 76/2. Somerset-House; Bindley, Fuseli & Haughton
: Museum; Ellis , Maurice &
Baber
. Aldises call n .

3. Sa. Philipses, p. 77. Somerset-House; Bindley, Fuseli & Haughton
: call on Curran
(adv. Am. & sir F Flood ),
Rodd
&
Wilson
: Owen dines. M calls.

Apr. 4. Su.
Commercial Hall burned. Rodd & Jo G call: call on
Place
: Curran & Am. dine. sir R Ps calls n .

5. M.
Somerset-House , & Museum; Baber . Call on Hume
; Newton , Hogan & M Lamb call.

6. Tu. Philipses, 4 pp. Call on Bindley
,
Longdil
&
Place
; adv. Owen : write to Lambert . sup at Kenney’s , w. Coleridge & Morgan .

7. W. Philipses, 2 pp. Museum; W Smith’s Narrative, &c.
Hogan sups.
8. Th. Hume & W Scott, çala. Museum; North, Examen, &c: Theatre, 1/2 Pannel: Aldises call n .

9. F.
Museum; W Smith .

10. Sa. Write to Munday . Call on R Sharp
: Curran dines; adv. Mulready
. M calls, & Poole n calls.
Apr. 11. Su. Trials of Coleman, Whitebread, &c. Owen calls.

12. M. Call on Clark, chamberlain
: Miss C Smith dines.

13. Tu. North, Examen, çala.
Lackington, State Tracts; adv. M
: call on sir Robt Peele
n : dine at Grattan’s , w. Curran, L Geo. Grenville & Jephson, 2 nephews; adv. C Charleville, mrs Scott, &c .

14. W. Coroner’s Inquest, Ann Edwards : Burgess calls: call on mrs Burgess
,
mrs Wilson
&
M
: dine at M’s
: M sups.

15. Th.
Red-Cross Library, & Museum; Somers’s Trcts
: call on Denley , Boswel &
Lamb
. L’Estrange, Hist. of the Times, çala.

16. F. L’Estrange, fin. A Curran calls:
Flather sups.
17. Sa. J P, Vindication of Oates.

Apr. 18. Su. Philipses, p. 81. Write to Hamond .
M Lb
& M Burney call:
Currans dine.

19. M.
Place calls: call on Waldron
, Denley & Barlace : Curran & Hogan call:
theatre, w. Curran; 4/5 Douglas; adv. Knowles & mrs Fuseli
: sup at S E’s , w. mrs Crotty, mrs Stewart, Delatres, M J, C B & J . Write to Constable .

20. Tu. Philipses, p. 83. Call on Rodd
: A Curran at tea. H Robinson sups.

21. W. Philipses, p. 85/2. Call on Denley
,
Turnerelli
&
Curran ( de filiis )
: sir R Phillips, & two daus call: Curran & miss Pearson dine; adv. Lambs & M Burney & Hogan
.

22. Th.
Surry-Institution; Gray, Chandler, & Oldmixon & Kennet
: S E dines; adv. Curran
.

23. F. Philipses, p. 87/2. Landseer calls: call on Gale
&
Cs
: A Curran at tea. Charter-House School Reformed.
24. Sa. Philipses, p. 88/2. College’s Trial, çala. Write to Baxter .

Apr. 25. Su. Philipses, p. 91. Burgess calls: call on
Place
.
26. M. Philipses, p. 92. Museum; Journals . Place calls.

27. Tu. Philipses, p. 96. Theatre, Education; adv. Hoare, Knowles & Yates
.
28. W. Philipses, p. 99. Write to Taylor, Norwich . Lackington calls.
29. Th. Eachard, Contempt of the Clergy, pp. 160: Speculum Crape-Gownorum, pp. 34. M calls.
30. F. Philipses, p. 102/2. Popish Successor, Part II. Owen dines.

May 1. Sa. Call on Nichols
&
Triphook
: Hamond calls.
May 2. Su. Philipses, p. 105/2. Dine at S E’s , w. M J, F & M .

3. M. Philipses, p. 106. Exhibition; adv. Perry, M Burney & Turnerelli
: call on Theobald
&
Hume
: dine at Curran’s , w. A C; adv. Tegart
: call on Rodd
.

4. Tu. Philipses, p. 107. See Haslewood : call on Hume
,
Place
&
Rodd
.

5. W. Call on Phipps
,
Maltby L I
,
Heber
&
Haselwood
col. Stanley’s ; adv. Perry
: dine at Curran’s , w. A C .

6. Th. Call on Smith, Organist
,
Rodd
,
Sturt
&
Mason
: seek Joseph Smith & Bayley : Hamond dines.

7. F. Philips, Don Quixote, çala. Call on Bayley
,
Bagster
, & Newman, Newgate
.

8. Sa. Philipses, p. 112. E Topping calls: seek Dr Kitchener : call on Boaden
n : Owen at tea: Dawe sup[s?]

May 9. Su. Philipses, p. 116. Call on Curran
: dine at Hume’s , w. Listons, Lambs, Dawes, M Burney; adv. mrs Reeves, mrs Hutchinson, mrs Brumsted & Rawley
.

10. M.
A C calls: call on
Curtis
,
Macmillan
&
Kitchener
: Lambs sup.

11. Tu. Call on Brookes
,
Wilson
,
Place
,
Hume
,
Knowles
&
J Taylor
: dine at Curran’s , w. A C : call on Waldron
.

12. W. Red-Cross Library; Mercuries: dine at Wilson’s , w. Lambs & Dyer; adv. Eaton & capt. Burney
: tea Curran’s ; adv. T Moore .

13. Th. Call on W Allen
,
Vaughan
,
Phipps
,
H Rogers ,
Jo G
&
Jervis
: M dines: dine at
Curran’s , w. A C ; adv. T Moore & Williams . Owen calls.

14. F.
Deptford; C Burney’s ; Newspapers: call on
Place
.

15. Sa. Philipses, p. 119. Call on Bagster
&
Rodd
: Owen sups: Hogan at tea: meet Rough & Robinson .
May 16. Su. Philipses, p. 121. Owen 1/2 dines.

17. M. Philipses, pp. 2.
Reynolds, Exhibition; w. M J, F, M & C Baxter; adv. Wilkie
: H Robinson sups.

18. Tu. Philipses, pp. 2. Reynolds, Exhibition. Call on Lauderdale
n &
Edgworths
n: call of Chalmers .

19. W. Call on Orme
&
Launcelot Sharpe
: Sion College, Mercuries & Romances .

20. Th. Call on Ellis
,
Gosset
,
Leigh
&
Place
: Owen at tea: Hogan sups. M dines.

21. F.
Lackington’s, Plutarch, Morals : call on Baber
,
B M
.

22. Sa.
Deptford; Burney’s, Struvius, &c : return, w. a pressed sailor, 5 years absent.

May 23. Su. Dunton & Dryden, çala. Call, w. M J, on Lambs ; adv. Morgans
: S E dines.

24. M.
Museum; Bayle, Plutarch & Boyer: call on Sheldon ; adv. Towers
. W C Brown calls na .

25. Tu. Philipses, p. 123. Red Cross Library; Plutarch & Tacitus : call on Knowles
&
Wilson
&
Place
.

26. W. Philipses, p. 124, 129, 130, 131/2. Duellum Musicum, pp. 52. Call on
Aldis
: E Mercier calls.
27. Th. Toland, Life of Milton. Meet J Foot : M Baugh at tea.
28. F. Philipses, p. 135, fin.

29. Sa. Philipses, 1 1/2 pp. Fanshaw, Horace. Edgworths , May & Trotman call: W C Brown at tea: tea
Aldis’s , w. Actons, Manning, Woodifield, M J, F, M, J, W & Chr. Baxter .

May 30. Su. Philipses, p. 137; Preface, pp. 2. Call on
Place ; adv. Thomas
: tea Kenney’s , w. M J, F, M, J, B M, Cbr & Fred. Pinkerton . miss Baugh calls na .

31. M. Write to Crowe & Patrickson . Sion College , London Institution & Lackington’s : miss Baugh calls, ppc. sup at
Lamb’s , w. M J, F, M, J, C Br & W .

June 1. Tu. Philipses, 2 pp. J B Curran breakfasts: call on Knowles
: Hogan at tea: H Robinson sups.

2. W. Philipses, 1 page. Call on Place
,
Wilson
,
Rodd
, & Taylor, St Martin’s
: J White calls: H Hopwood sleeps. A Curran calls. Write to Gutch .

3. Th. Philipses, 2 pp. Museum; adv. capt. Burney
: C Br & M for Dundee .
4. F. Philipses, 1/2 page. Patrickson dines. Coach for Oxford; sick soldier, &c: sup at Slough.

5. Sa. Call on Parker
,
Lloyd
,
Gutch
&
Munday
, Oxford: visit the Bodleian & Ashmolean ( Bandinel & Bayley ): tea Parker’s
; w. him, meet Collingwood printer : sleep at Roebuck.
June 6. Su.Breakfast, Angel: dine at Bensington: tea Henley, at the Bell; sleep. Write to M J .
7. M. Walk before breakfast: Wallingford coach, w. Mrs Barnard o’ th’ Wexford , & Wallingford farmer . P P sups.

8. Tu. Aubrey, transcribe. Call on Place
,
Shelley
n, & J F Newton, for Shelley
: tea Shelley’s ; adv. Hog
: Lky callsn : H Robinson sups.
9. W. Aubrey, transcribe, fin. M J calls on Shelley : M calls: Hogan sups. Write to Curran .

10. Th. Write to Shelley .
Lackington’s , w. M J
:
P P.e sups & sleeps.

11. F.
Cripplegate Register . Call on Shelley
n ,
Place
&
T Rodd
.

12. Sa. Philipses, 1 page. Write to Dr C Burney . Shelley calls, walk towd Highgate: call on Aldis
n . Hamond calls.

June 13. Su. Philipses, 1 page. Dine at Shelley’s , w. Hogg; adv. Hookham & Peacock
.
14. M. Drummond, çala. Kennies, A Curran & F Ht dine.
15. Tu. Philipses, 1 1/2 pp. Sheldon, Compleat History.
16. W. Philipses, 2 pp. Red Cross Library : sup at S E’s, w. M J, Hales, capt. Pocock & W . Hamond dines.

17. Th. Philipses, 1 page. Call on Aldis
&
Shelley
n : M dines: Hamond & Dawe sup . Write to Parker . Hogan at tea.

18. F.
Lackingtons & Simmons’s
: M calls.

19. Sa. Philipses, 1/2 page. A Curran at tea: call on Clemonti
na . Williams (Tany-y- ralt) calls.

June 20. Su. Letter to Shelley .
P P dines & sleeps. 2 nights. Call on Lamb
n &
Waldron
.
21. M. Philipses, 2 pp. Call on Clementi , w. M J : meet Shelley : Chamberlaine calls: Arnot, surgeon, at tea. Battle of Vittoria .

22. Tu.
Museum; Skinner ; Street; adv. Lawrence, ch : theatre, Douglas, S Ss .

23. W. Philipses, 2 pp. Museum, Skinner .
Aldis’s dine; adv. Hogan & R Morell
.

24. Th. Philipses, 2 pp. Angerstein’s, fr., w. A & W Curran, & Quin junr
;
Reynolds’s, w. A C
: sup at Kenney’s , w. M J, M & E Betham, & Lamb : call on S E , for F & J
.

25. F. Philipses, 2 pp. Museum, Skinner : Lamb sups. Call on
Shelley
n : Place calls.
26. Sa. Philipses, 2 pp. Hogan & R M sup. Write to Gutch, Oxon.

June 27. Su. Philipses, p. 140. Write to Shelley . Call on Place
: S E dines; adv. P P
.

28. M. Letter from Shelley . Call on Longdil
: Museum ; adv. Lawrence : call on Denley
:
theatre, w. Lamb ; Hole in the Wall. Write to Merivale . Call on Wilson
na .

29. Tu. Call on Curtis
: Edge calls: W C Brown sups.

30. W.
Shepherd (Liverpool) calls: Angerstein’s, fr: call on
S Rogers
, Barnard (Buckingham House) ,
Shelley
&
Rodd
: seek Nassau .

July 1. Th.
Evans, of Aldgate , calls:
Museum, Don Juan Lamberto : seek Lambert, Camden Town
: tea Kenney’s
.

2. F.
Phipps calls: Museum; Montelion’s Astrology : dine at Shelley’s
.

3. Sa. Writ for A G H . Call at Buckingham House
.

July 4. Su. Montelion, pp. 124. Call on Place
: dine at Shelley’s , w. 3 Newtons, & Williams; adv. Hogg
.

5. M.
Lambert calls: Museum : call on Triphook
: seek Milner : Shelley calls, w. Hookham : Hogan sups.

6. Tu.
Museum; Lilly, Ashmole & Gadbury : M calls: call on
Hume
. Austin & his Wife, pp. 154.

7. W.
Angerstein’s , w. W & A Curran : Museum : Lackington’s, Lilly . Mysterious Stranger, pp. 143.

8. Th. Lamberto, Part II: Lilly, çala.
Museum : M dines.
9. F. Philipses, pp. 3: Newton callsn : H Robinson sups. Hutchinson on Witchcraft, çala.

10. Sa. Philipses, pp. 4. Tea
Shelley’s
. Write to Patrickson . Hudibras, Sidrophel.

July 11. Su. Philipses, pp. 3. Dine at Hume’s , w. Northcote, & Fawcets, jr ; adv. miss Hay, & miss Denis
.
12. M. Philipses, pp. 1 1/2. Museum; Lilly & Montelion . Mrs Topping dines.
13. Tu. Philipses, pp. 2. Museum; do. Hamilton & M call: Hogan at tea.

14. W. Baker’s Chronicle, çala. Call on Walker, Kensington
: dine at Newton’s , w. Shelley & Hog . Call on Place ; adv. Bone & Thomas
.
15. Th. Baker, çala. Hogan sups: meet T & C T.

16. F. Baker, çala. 5 Humes & 2 Browns dine; invité Northcote
.
17. Sa. Philipses, 1 page. Baker, çala. Dine at Shelley’s , w. Newtons : Hamond calls n : Hogan sups. Write to Curran .

July 18. Su. Baker, çala. Sup at Kenney’s , w. M J; adv. A Curran & E Mercier
.

19. M. Flatman & Baker, çala. Call on Law
&
Hogan
. Philipses, 1/2 page.
20. Tu. Baker, çala. L Kenney & sons call.

21. W. Write to Patrickson & H Boinville . Baker, çala. E Mercier, & T & H Ht dine; adv. L Kenney
: call on A Curran
: sup at Topping’s , w. Weale, M J & J.
22. Th. Philipses, 1 page. Write to C C . Baker, çala. Meet Coleridge . Parliament prorogued.
23. F. Philipses, 1 page. Baker, çala.

24. Sa. Philipses, 1 1/2 pp. Hamond & Shelley call: dine at
Aldis’s
: Hogan sups.

July 25. Su. Philipses, 1 page. Heath, çala. Call on on Aldis
&
Waldron
: meet Hamond :
26. M. Philipses, 1/2 page. Boscobel, pp. 93. M dines.

27. Tu. Baker, çala. Call on Poole
&
Letterman
: A Curran calls: S E dines; adv. Kennies, Lamb & M Burney
.
28. W. Philipses, p. 144. Du Bartas, Abraham. Randolph dies

29. Th. Philipses, p. 147, fin. Du Bartas, Pharoah. Call on Knowles
:
Hogan tea & supper .
30. F. Philipses, 1 page. Du Bartas, Job, cap. 10. F & L Ht dine.

31. Sa. Write to C C & mrs Fletcher & Patrickson . Du Bartas, Job, c. 21. Call on Murray
: Hogan sups.

Aug. 1. Su. Philipses, 1/2 page. Du Bartas, Job, c. 32. Dine at Kenney’s
na, & M J, F, J & W; adv. mrs Silver, & A Curran
.

2. M. Philipses, 1 page. Du Bartas, Job, c. 42. Call on Phipps
&
Rodd
: meet Hamond : Hogan at tea.
3. Tu. Du Bartas, Eden. Merivale calls: Hogan sups.

4. W. Call on Murray ; adv. Byron & Merivale
.

5. Th. Du Bartas, Deceipt. M Jones , F Ht, & Barrets call: call on Hume
.
6. F. Milton, Defensio, p. 12: Du Bartas, 1/2 Furies: Albion’s England, çala.

7. Sa.
Bagley & Hogan call: M dines: Hogan sups.

Aug. 8. Su. Write to Hogan . Du Bartas, Furies, fin: Phaer, çala. Dine at Hume , w. Lamb, & Fawcets, jr
: sup, w. Lamb, at Coleridge’s
.
9. M. Du Bartas, Handicrafts: Spenser, Warner & Phaer, çala. Hamond calls: Hogan at tea.

10. Tu. Du Bartas, Arke & Babiton. Call on Place
&
Hume
: Hogan calls.

11. W. Birch’s Eliz, çala. Write to Patrickson . Adlard calls: call on Newton
nit : Hogan sups, fin.

12. Th. Write to Shelley , & Taylor, Norwich
. Birch, çala. Call on
Phillips ; adv. Lawrence & W C Brown
: Kenney dines; adv. L K & Lambs
.

13. F. Birch, çala. Call on Egerton
&
Phipps
.

14. Sa. Write to Shelley & miss Taylor . Call on Poole
&
Place
: Reynolds’s Exhibition: sup at S E’s , w. Pococks, Carter & Delaitre : meet Perry : Caffal calls: Write to Curran .

emph.ref: Ask the address of Mrs Grattan, widow of Gen. Grattan

div.ab:
Aug. 15. Su. Write to Denham . Juell, p. 37: Daniel on Devonshire. Call on Pratt, Islington
: F Ht calls.
16. M. Du Bartas, Colonies.
17. Tu. Write to Shelley & Hamond . Don Quixote, p. 44. Hogan at tea. M J for South End .
18. W. Du Bartas, Columns: Quixote, p. 100. Coleridge & calls: Shelley at tea, from High Elms . Write to M J.

19. Th. Call on Macmillan
. Shelley breakfasts: call, w. him, on Phipps
& Denham
: call on R Sharp
: answer from Denham : sup at Lamb’s
.

20. F. Write to Shelley & M J . Call on L Kenney
n : meet M : sup at S E’s
.

21. Sa. Du Bartas, 1/2 Vocation. W & S for South End . Call on Egerton
,
Dawe
, & Miles at Starling’s
: M dines; adv. Lambert
: meet Hume .
Aug. 22. Su. Letter to M J . Dine at Aldis’s , w. Johnsons & miss Cartwright .
23. M. Write to Shelley & M J . Battle of the Books, pp. 48. Hutton calls.

24. Tu. Write to Place & M J . Call on Spry
&
Weston
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Hazlit & F . M dines, adv. Hogan
.

25. W. Write to Shelley . Call on Weston
,
Wordsworth
&
Evans
, &
L Kenney
: sup at S E’s , w. M .

26. Th. Write to J Taylor (Norwich) , Shelley & M J . Cooke, p. 90. Call on
Hogan
, & Evans, Camberwel
: Hogan sups. Settlement at Crosby’s
. Letter from Hume, on Winchester .

27. F. Call on Hume
&
mrs Collier
. Cooke, p. 344. Hogan at tea: Place jr calls, & Poole na . Iron Pillar.

28. Sa. Write to Hume , M J , C C & Withers . Cooke, Vol. II. Call on Place jr
.
Aug. 29. Su. Seneca, Ad Helviam, c. 1-5: Richard III, acts 1, 2, 3. Shelley calls.
30. M. Seneca, c. 5, 6. Write to Wedgwood , Hamond , E Wt , & M J . Richard, act 4. Shelley dines: seek Comrie & W Morgan : Hamond calls na . M do .

31. Tu. Seneca, c. 7, 8. Write to M J & Ml
. Seek Comrie : call on Hume
&
Ward
: Hamond calls: A Curran dines. Hogan après souper .

Sep. 1. W. Seneca, c. 9: 1/2 Timon. Seek Comrie : call on Place
: meet B Montagu .

2. Th. Seneca, c. 10. Write to M J , Withers & Patrickson . Seek Comrie : call on Walkden
: sup at Lamb’s , w. 2 Burneys, Hazlit, Kirkpatrick & Rayle & F .

3. F. Seneca, c. 11, 12. Write to Hamond . Call on Comrie
&
Hume
: M calls: Hogan at tea.

4. Sa. Barge to South-End, w. tradesman & three maid-servants : sleep at Child’s, M J & W . Write to Shelley , & Taylor, Norwich
.
Au Sep. 5. Su. Letter from Place . Walk to Prittlewel, w. W, & to farm-yards, w. M J .
6. M. Coach, outside, w. Forster & family , &c; dine at Billericay: tea Skinner Street.

7. Tu. Write to Shelley & M J . Northcote’s Reynolds, çala. Place calls: call, w. him, on Hamond
: Hogan at tea.

8. W. Write to Constable . Northcote, fin. Hamond , Macmillan & C Tayler call: call on
Place ; adv. H Richter
: Hogan calls.
9. Th. Write to Shepherd (Liverpool) , H Shelley , C C & M J . Seneca, Ad Helviam, fin. Hayward , Place & Hamond call.

10. F. Seneca, Ad Marciam, c. 1, 2, 3: Henry VI, pt 2. Call on Hogan
n &
Place
: Hogan at tea.

11. Sa. Write to Taylor, Norwich
, & M J . Seneca, De Injuria, c. 1-6. Call on Rogers H
, &
Place
; adv. J Richter : Hamond calls.

Sep. 12. Su. Seneca, c. 9: Henry VI, pt 3.
Joyce calls: call on Place
: sup at L Kenney’s , w. F .

13. M. Write to M J . Seneca, c. 13. Coleridge & Aldis call: M dines; adv. Hogan
. Write to Constable, accounts .

14. Tu. Write to Hume . Seneca, c. 17. Call on
Place
: Place & M call.

15. W. Write to M J & C C . Seneca, c. 19. Call on Place
: Miller jr
& Hamond call: Hogan at tea: Lambs & M Burney sup.

16. Th. Write to C C & Taverham Mills . Seneca, De Providentia, c. 1, 2.
Hogan calls, & at tea . Letter from Hume .

17. F. Seneca, c. 3, 4. Write to Shelley . Hogan calls: call on Hume
&
Place
: visit Mackintosh , w. Mde Stael, Horner, Jos. Wedgwood jr & miss Allens .
18. Sa. Barge for South End; tea, half-way House to Gravesend; sleep on board; reach Gravesend at two in the morning.
Sep. 19. Su. See Gravesend at six, & South End at ten: South End, dine (walk in the sea): Labyrinth.

20. M. Walk to Prittlewel, &c: call on mrs Trower, watchmaker
.

ab.ref: Chaise to Bill Rayleigh; dine: Gig to Billericay; tea: fish-cart to town, w. landlord from Billericay : Skinner Street, 11 at night.

div.ab:
22. W.
Hamond , Hogan , Newton & Macmillan call: call on Place
: sup at S E’s , w. F . Write to M J.
23. Th. Write to Shelley . Call on Pearce , w. Hogan : Hayward & Hamond call: M & S E dine.
24. F. Write to M J & Hamilton . Hamond & Hogan call: theatre, 1/2 Road to Ruin.

25. Sa. Write to C C & M J . Seneca, c. 5, 6. Call on
Hookham
n &
Mackintosh
: Curran au soir.
Sep. 26. Su. Oceana, &c, çala. A Curran calls: Curran dines: W & Sarah from South End .

27. M. Write to M J . Seneca, Ep. 1, 2, 3: Philautus & Timothy, pp. 65. Call on Hookham
.

28. Tu. Write to Shelley . Seek Chandless : call on Place
: M & Hamond call: sup at
Lamb’s , w. Hazlit & F . Seek Curtis .

29. W.
M J from South End.
Call on Place
: Macmillan calls n . Hobbes, çala.

30. Th. Marvel, çala. Curran & Lambert call: call on Place , pro Rickman
.

Oct. 1. F. Seneca, c. 4, 5.
Currans call, adv. Patrickson
: Patrickson dines; adv.Hogan
.
2. Sa. Write to Constable . Wild, çala. Curran & Patrickson call: S E dines.
Oct. 3. Su. Iter Boreale: Corinne, p. 110. Patrickson dines.

4. M. Write to Shelley & West . Seneca, Ep. 6, 7: Corinne, p. 194. Currans & Kenneys & F Ht dine; adv. Patrickson
.

5. Tu. Seneca, Ep. 8, 9: Corinne, p. 268. Hamond calls: call on Me Stael ; adv. Mlle , Davy & Elisée
: theatre, Non-Descript; adv. Taylors , Fuseli & Kno .

6. W. Seneca, Ep. 10, 11: Corinne, p. 322. Write to Shelley . Call on Rodd
: Lambs & M Burney sup. M & Patrickson dine.
7. Th. Catalogue for C C . Philip Sparrow: Corinne, Vol. II, p. 90.

8. F. Speak Parrot: Corinne, p. 154.
Hamond calls: Patrickson dines.

9. Sa. Setting off for Bracknel . Corinne, p. 200. Catalogue for C C . Dine at Curran’s , w. A C & Rippingham; two creeds, le premier pour les dames
.

Oct. 10. Su. Corinne, p. 327; Vol. III, p. 73. Call on Place
.

11. M. Corinne, p. 175. Call on Carter
&
Hume
:
theatre, w. M J; Merchant of Venice .

12. Tu. Corinne, p. 337. Call on Pearce
nit ,
Letterman
&
Place
: meet Wilson : A Curran & Hogan at tea. meet Hill .

13. W. Corinne, p. 4 . . , fin. Hamond calls: call on Hayward
n , & R S Taylor, Gray’s Inn
: theatre, Othello; adv. Fuseli & Knowles
.

14. Th. Write to Constable . Hayward & Jas Smith call:
Curran dines; adv. M & Hayward
. A Taylor calls.

15. F. Write to Shelley & C C . Seneca, Ep. 12: Skelton, agst the Scots: Julie, p. 20. Call on Hayward
: Hamond calls.

16. Sa. Seneca, Ep. 13, 14. Call on Pearce
,
Curran (ad. Glen & Bell ), &, w. him, on Me Stael
: Hogan dines: H Robinson sups.
Oct. 17. Su. What You Will: Dutch Courtesan. Jas Smith calls.

18. M. Davideis, Book I & II. Dine at
Me Stael’s , w. Curran, Adair, Wishart, H Robinson, Murray & La. Mackintosh . Call on Place , w. Curran . Battle of Leipsig .

19. Tu. Write to Shelley . Davideis, B. III. Call on Pearce
&
Hayward
: Hogan at tea: theatre, 1/2 Artaxerxes; adv. Coates
.

20. W. Epictetus, pp. 66. Hamond calls: call on Hume
.

21. Th. Call on Curtis
,
Pearce
,
Morgan Actuary
&
Aldis
: theatre, Venice Preserved; adv. J Taylor
. M dines.

22. F. Call on M
&
Skelton
n : Hogan at tea.

23. Sa. Write to Constable & C C . Davideis, B. IV. Dine at
Curran’s , w. A C, Tegart, Boyd; adv. Rippingham
.

Oct. 24. Su. Odyssey, v. 177: Scaliger, de Causis, çala. Call on Place
: dine at Curran’s , w. A C & Rippingham .

25. M. Odyssey, v. 305: Chapman: Morgan Godwyn, çala. Call on Poynton
.

26. Tu. Odyssey, v. 444. Hamond calls: call on Place
: theatre, Miller & Men. Write to A Robinson .

27. W. Odyssey, B. II, v. 128. Kidder calls: call on Place
.

28. Th. Odyssey, v. 207. W & A Curran call: call on Fenning , R E A ,
Place
, &
Murray
, &
Triphook
; adv. D’Israeli : Hayward calls: P Pilcher arrives.

29. F. Odyssey, v. 320. Skelton, Colin Clout. Seek Howard (w. Hayward) & Lett : call at Hookham’s
: M calls, & Poole .

30. Sa. Write to C C . Call on Lett
,
Knowles
&
Macmillan
: Hogan at tea. Hamond calls n .

Oct. 31. Su. Call on Newton
n ,
Inchbald
, &
mrs C Smh
, adv. mrs Stokes : Poole calls n : dine at Kenney’s , w. M J, Botwright, M, Callon & F Pinkerton; adv. Silvers & Hanburys
.

Nov. 1. M. Write to Shelley & miss Hamond . Why come Ye not to Court? Call on Place
: W & A Curran at tea; invités Kennies & Lambs
.

2. Tu. Cromwel, çala. Call on Bagley
n (Hackney),
Newcome
,
Bonsor
&
Macmillan
.

3. W. Call on Bagley
,
Cooper
, &
Place
: meet Macmillan : Hogan at tea. News of Leipsig .

4. Th.
Bagley & Donaldson call: call on Palmer (with Bagley) &
Place
: Hamond calls n : Hogan dines. Parliament meets.

5. F. Siege of Colchester, p. 88. Call on Hamond, &, w.
Hogan
, on Knapton
,
Rickman
&
Tristram
. M dines: call on
Place ; adv. Wakefield
. Barr[ ?] & Kidder call.

6. Sa. Call on Lambert , w. Place ; & on Hamond
,
Lambert
&
Place
: Hamond & P Smith call.

Nov. 7. Su. Write to Shelley . Siege of Colchester, p. 266, fin: House of Cromwel, çala. Call on Lamb ; adv. P Lloyd
; & on H Robinson
n .

8. M. Call on Lett
,
Carter
&
Place
: sup at Aldis’s , w. M J, Walsh & Patrick . Call on Hume
: meet Newton .
9. Tu. Fever. Barrows & W Curran n call: Jas Simpson dines n .

10. W. Write to Constable & B M . K Letter from Hume, P O
. Miss Cha. Smith calls: Kenney dines; adv. Lbs & H Robinson
.

11. Th. Cromwel, çala. Lett calls na . M dines; adv. Hogan na
.

12. F.
Shelley, deed, &c . Cromwel, çala.

13. Sa.
T S, Certificate . Cromwel, çala. Hamond , W Curran n & Hogan na call.
Nov. 14. Su. Cromwel, çala. W Curran na & Lambert call.

15. M. Life of Sanderson, pp. 140: Cavendish’s Wolsey, p. 60. Hume calls: call on
Hume
. M J for Horsham . Revolution of Holland .
16. Tu. Wolsey, p. 207. Surr , A Curran , S E , Hamond , E Mercier , Char. Nicholson & M call. M J returns.
17. W. Lord Cavendish, p. 200: Montaigne, çala. Snow.
18. Th. Cavendish, p. 324. R Taylor , Place & Peto call: M dines: Hamond at tea.

18. F.
Write to Baxter & Constable . Cavendish, p. 462: Rienzi, p. 36. W Curran , L Kenney & Hogan call: Hogan dines.
20. Sa. Rienzi, p. 110. Poole , Hamond 2 & Robley n call: M J calls on Russel , Cooper & R T : Hogan dines.
Nov. 21. Su. Rienzi, p. 203. Stoddart calls: call on Place .

22. M. Rienzi, p. 223. Hume & P Lloyd & Hamd call: call on Hume
,
Macmillan
&
Place
: M dines. Write to Hamond .

23. Tu.
M & Hume call: dine at
Poole’s , w. Matthews, Terry, Jas Smith, Pocock, Litchfield, Rae, Winslow Young, Hodson & Miller . Rienzi, p. 264. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. H

24. W. Rienzi, p. 336. Call on Carter
n : sup at Lamb’s ; adv. Dyer
. Hogan at tea.
25. Th. Write to Shelley . Rienzi, p. 367. Theatre, 4/5 Henry V.

26. F. Seneca & Bacon, çala: Davies, Discoverie, p. 64: Exemplary Novels, p. 54. Call on Hume
: Hogan at tea.

27. Sa. Novum Organum, init. Call on Cooper
&
Place
.
Nov. 28. Su. N Org., p. 46: Ex. Novels, p. 126. Tea Mackintosh , w. Stael, Ward, Romillys, sir Jno. Malcolm, R Sharp, D Stewart, Jas Moore, Osborne, Dumont, Phillips, S Wedgwood & mrs Graham .

29. M. Write to Baxter . Call on Bindley
& Hume {.} Theatre, Antony; adv. Hill
.
30. Tu. Write to Manners & Miller . Call on Place , twice: M calls: Kenney & L Ht dine. M J frm Hill .

Dec. 1. W. Call on Pearce
n ,
Carter
&
Hume
: mt Place :
M from R Sharp, & Gale & Curtis , dines: call on Addington
&
Place
. Declaration of the Allies.

2. Th. Write to Shelley . Call on Pearce
: A Curran sups. Cobbet, mercer, calls, & Jas Simpson .

3. F. Write to C C . Call on Hume
,
Place
&
J Taylor
, &
Jas White
. Bacon, Essays, 1 to 12.

4. Sa. Write to Patrickson . Owen calls: call on
Place
&
Cobbet
. Cervantes, p. 177.

Dec. 5. Su. Call on Bindley
,
Macmillan
&
Place
: Hamond dines.

6. M.
P Pilcher, ppc, calls: call on Carter
&
Hume
: Hume, Day & Faithful dine: call on
Me Stael
n ,
Jas Smith
n &
Place
.

7. Tu. Write to Day , Shelley & C C . Call on Day
: Hume & Chas Hume call: Hogan at tea: theatre; Nourjahad, & Who is to Have her.

8. W. Cervantes, p. 200. Call on Starkey
&
Jo G
: seek Davison : H Robinson & Hamond calln . Call on Russel , C House .

9. Th. Write to Shelley & Day . Call on Hume
,
Place
&
Macmillan
, &
M Lamb
.

10. F.
Shelley breakfasts: Newton calls: sup at
Lb’s , w. M J, F, W, & M Burney; adv. Dyer
. W & A Curran call n .

11. Sa. Write to Mary & Day . Call on Pearce
: Newton calls fr. Shelley : Hopwood’s, Hurst’s, Tooke’s Court, w. Shelley, Newton, Hookham, Sorrel & Amory : Shelley sleeps.

Dec. 12. Su.
Shelley till three; Bacon, &c: Cervantes, p. 220.

13. M. Corr. with Hume . Call on Wilson
&
Rodd
.

14. Tu. Call on Hume
,
Macmillan
&
Place
; adv.Owen : Owen at tea. Freeman, engraver, calls.

15. W. Write to Thurlow . Philipses, revise. Call on Hume
: W & A Curran sup. Shelley calls n . Jane at home.

16. Th. Philipses, revise. Write to Day . Hogan calls: call on Place
: S E dines; adv. Hogan & Owen
.
Bosville dies.
17. F. Philipses, revise. Hogan at tea: H Robinson sups.

18. Sa. Call on Davison
,
Amory
,
Nanson
&
Eyre
. Shelley & Hogan call n : M dines.

Dec. 19. Su. Philipses, 3 pp. Faithful calls: dine at Newton’s , w. Shelley, Hog, Lawrence & Hookham;adv. Dawe & Whitelocke
.
Bonaparte to his Senate.

20. M. Letter from Day . Call on Poole
. Coach for Maldon, w. Bridges jr , W K, &c: sup at Day’s
. Day writes to Pattison & Laver . Parliament adjourns.

21. Tu.
Day breakfasts; adv. Draper
: walk to Beeley Abbey: dine at Day’s
. Write to MJ . Allies enter France .

22. W.
Day breakfasts; adv. Draper
: chaise to Chelmsford: Ipswich coach home.

23. Th. Call on Pearce
,
Place
&
Hume
: Hogan calls: seek Sutton . Dyer calls. Write to Day .

24. F. Write to Patrickson . Call on Sutton
&
Jas White
: Hamond calls.
25. Sa. Love & Eloquence, çala. Kennies dine.
Dec. 26. Su. On Fortitude, 1 page: On Poetry, 1 page. Seneca, Ad Helviam, c. 1-6: Queen Mab, passim.

27. M. Seneca, c. 6, 7. Letter from Day . Call on Plce
, &
Shelley
, St James’s Hotel; adv. Newtons & Lawrence : seek Jones, Size Lane . Hamilton calls.

28. Tu. Call on Jones
&
Hume
: Hume calls on M J : M dines; adv. Hogan
: meet Hamond . Write to Mackintosh . Chamberlaine calls.

29. W. Call on Mackintosh
,
Hume
&
Hayward
. Macmillan calls.

30. Th. Write to miss Hamond . Call on Hume
, &
Leathersellers
: Hamond dines.

31. F. Write to Shelley . Call on Pearce
,
Price
,
Gell
na , &
Hume
: L Kenney dines; adv. Hogan
.
